department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of 2 bins for research centre. Bins must have aeration
description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) in Mordern is looking to purchase , a Smooth Walled Hopper Bottom Grain Bin with Aeration two (2) 16 foot diameter
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## 01634-221005 - Hopper Bottom Grain Bin

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3724906857-DOC3731586698
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: November 18, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 20, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined

### Tender Description

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Morden Research and Development Centre, requires the supply and delivery of two (2) 16 foot diameter Smooth Walled Hopper Bottom Grain Bins with Aeration. The bins will be used to support various cropping programs on station and off-station.

### Tender Status
The tender has expired.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Contact Name**: Oana Lee (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ **Contact Email**: oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ **Tender Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14519210

### Important Notes

* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 8, 2022 at 1400 EST.
* All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. I hope this rewritten entry meets your expectations. Let me know if I can assist you with anything else!




 Cedric
